Package Variables

Class Variable

java.lang.Object
Variables.Variable
public class Variable
extends java.lang.Object
The class is the variable object and contains all the methods to interact with it.
Since:
04/01/20
Version:
1.0
Author:
George Lloyd-Anderson

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Variable​(java.lang.String name, int value)
    The Constructor takes two values and sets them to the properties of the class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getKey()
    The getKey command can be called to retrive the name of the variable.
    int getPair()
    This method returns the value associated with the variable to the calling class.
    void setKey​(java.lang.String key)
    This method allows the calling class to change the name of the variable.
    void setPair​(int pair)
    The setPair method allows the calling class to change the value of the variable.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Variable

      public Variable​(java.lang.String name, int value)
      The Constructor takes two values and sets them to the properties of the class
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the variable
      value - The value of the variable

  • Method Details

    • getKey

      public java.lang.String getKey()
      The getKey command can be called to retrive the name of the variable.
      Returns:
      returns the key (Variable Name)

    • setKey

      public void setKey​(java.lang.String key)
      This method allows the calling class to change the name of the variable.
      Parameters:
      key - the key the user wants to change the key to.

    • getPair

      public int getPair()
      This method returns the value associated with the variable to the calling class.
      Returns:
      returns the value of the variable.

    • setPair

      public void setPair​(int pair)
      The setPair method allows the calling class to change the value of the variable.
      Parameters:
      pair - The value the user wants to associate with the variable.
